name: <mm::dma::dma_coherent::DmaCoherent as mm::io_util::HasVmReaderWriter>::reader

mm::io_util::HasVmReaderWriter::reader.doc: Returns a reader to read data from it.

mm::mem_obj::HasSize::size.doc: Returns the size of the memory object in bytes.

mm::io::VmReader::<'a, mm::io::Infallibl.doc:
Constructs a `VmReader` from a pointer and a length, which represents
 a memory range in kernel space.

 # Safety

 `ptr` must be [valid] for reads of `len` bytes during the entire lifetime `a`.

 [valid]: crate::mm::io#safety
